title: Thai Airways fly 748
creator_credit: Technical and Scientific Films, British Information Services and Paul Cullerne
brief_description: The British Hawker 748 seen in daily scheduled operation with Thai Airways against the spectacular scenery and colourful background of Thailand. The aircraft are seen in service on Thailand’s internal routes and in production at Manchester. Features of the aircraft are explained and its ease of servicing illustrated.
